amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that "Determination", as contained in the bill, is consistent with the mission of the agency and with the existing merit-review criteria.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 235 (Roll no. 68).
